channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump officials propose testing a citizenship question amid a push to alter the census
item.description: The Trump administration proposes to include a question about U.S. citizenship status in this year's field test of the 2030 census, as Republicans pus...

item.title: The Winter Olympics in Italy were meant to be sustainable. Are they?
item.description: Italy's Winter Olympics promised sustainability. But in Cortina, environmentalists warn the Games could scar these mountains for decades.

item.title: Day 5 of search for Nancy Guthrie: 'We still believe Nancy is still out there'
item.description: The FBI is offering a reward of up to $50,000 for information leading to the recovery of Guthrie and/or the arrest and conviction of anyone involved i...

item.title: What a crowded congressional primary in N.J. says about the state of Democrats
item.description: The contest is one of the first congressional primaries of the year where we will find out what issues are currently resonating with some Democratic v...

item.title: Their film was shot in secret and smuggled out of Iran. It won an award at Sundance
item.description: Between war, protests and government crackdowns, the filmmakers raced to finish and smuggle their portrait of Tehran's underground arts scene to the p...

item.title: The typical American worker has $955 saved for retirement
item.description: Millions of Americans lack access to any type of retirement plan, hampering their ability to save for old age.

item.title: "Tsunami" of immigration cases strains U.S. Attorney's offices across America
item.description: As immigration sweeps expand nationwide, the work of justifying detentions is overwhelming federal prosecutors, who are being forced to sideline a ran...

item.title: Russia and Ukraine exchange prisoners as peace talks end without breakthrough
item.description: The swap - the first since October - sees 157 Ukrainians and 160 Russians returned home.

item.title: Arthur Brooks explains why therapy won't necessarily make you happier
item.description: A growing number of Americans are seeking time with a counselor to help treat depression and anxiety. One in seven Americans received mental health co...

item.title: Dozens of Muslims 'massacred' in Nigeria for refusing to join jihadists, says governor
item.description: At least 78 bodies have been buried, while there are fears that around 170 people were killed altogether.

item.title: Israeli intelligence chief's brother charged with smuggling cigarettes into Gaza
item.description: Bezalel Zini, an Israeli military reservist on active duty, is accused of smuggling 14 cartons of cigarettes in exchange for $117,000.

item.title: Minneapolis man is charged with threatening and cyberstalking ICE officers
Homeland Security shutdown grows more likely as Republicans rebuff Democrats’ ICE demands
Bad Bunny says 2026 Super Bowl halftime show will "be a huge party"
item.description: Bad Bunny says he wants to bring his culture to his Super Bowl halftime show Sunday.

item.title: Lebanon says Israel sprayed southern villages with concentrated herbicide
item.description: Israel declines to comment on the allegation its planes sprayed glyphosate over an area with extensive farmland.

item.title: Starmer apologises to Epstein victims for believing Mandelson's 'lies'
item.description: The PM says the depth of the pair's relationship was not known when he was appointed US ambassador.

item.title: Savannah Guthrie’s missing mother is ‘still out there,’ sheriff says, but no suspects
item.description: Investigators believe the missing mother of “Today” show host Savannah Guthrie is “still out there,” but they have not identified any suspects.

item.title: Maryland man faces attempted murder charges for targeting OMB director
item.description: Colin Demarco was arrested in January, months after he was seen in a Ring camera image at Vought's door, wearing a surgical mask and gloves.
